title: Not worth the time
review: I'm a big horror fan and thought I'd give this one a go. Absolute waste of time. The acting was pretty bad and overall just hard to get through this one. Should have followed my gut and stayed away.

title: Really Bad
review: This movie is not worth the time it took to make it. The actors and actresses are terrible.

title: Gave it a go...
review: And it was a pure waste of time. From the beginning until the end. Made no sense. I mean the guy making people kill others by a pill. It states in the title explaination that he brainwashed, HOW? He had no communication until end. Also why would anyone on earth a drink that a stranger gave them.
